title: The Company Data Summary Domain Schema
description: Contains a summary of public registered information about an entity

EntityId.title: Internal Id for entities
EntityId.description: Contains Axesor360 unique ID for the entity

VendorEntityId.title: Vendor Id for Entities
VendorEntityId.description: External Id (from vendors) for the entity

EntityName.title: Entity name
EntityName.description: Full name or business name of the entity

LastUpdate.title: Info about last update
LastUpdate.description: Date of last update of the date contained

AnnualPublicationsList.title: List of Publications sorted by year
AnnualPublicationsList.description: List of years with publications or document filings concerning events related to the entity

Year.title: Publication year
Year.description: Year of the group of publications

TypeGroupsList.title: List of types or groups
TypeGroupsList.description: List of publications sorted by type or group

Type.title: Publication related type
Type.description: Act or event type that describes the subject of the event published

TypeGroup.title: Publication related group type
TypeGroup.description: Parent group for act or event types that describes the subject of the event published
examples: Procesos de Fusi贸n o Escisi贸n

VendorTypeId.title: Vendor Type Id
VendorTypeId.description: Internal vendor code used to refer its specific act or event type

VendorTypeGroupId.title: Vendor Type Group Id
VendorTypeGroupId.description: Internal vendor code used to refer its specific act or event parent group type

Priority.title: Type priority
Priority.description: Marks the priority of the type amongst the others. The higher the value, the higher the prioriry

Detail.title: Type or group detail
Detail.description: Type or group detail: number of events, deposit year, etc.
